message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. The product, valued at $1,200,000 to you, is an exceptional opportunity to streamline processes and achieve remarkable results. Considering its immense worth and the benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $1,150,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant savings compared to its market value. I look forward to discussing this further and potentially securing this deal with you.
